message: Hello Bob, I have a unique product that I think you'll be interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. That's a bit too high for me. Would you consider $80?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I can do better than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $95?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $105, but I'm not going any lower than that.
